original_title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 2
overview: Secrets of The Ring With Raven Vol. 2 focuses on Raven teaching "starpower." You'll learn the importance of having starpower, how to get it, what the greats do and all the subtle things that you'll never learn by just reading the internet or the sheets.  Raven discusses the importance of presence and how to get presence, your ring outfit and how to carry yourself like a star. These are only a few of the invaluable lessons Raven teaches. Raven discusses too many topics to list here!!!  Of course, any Raven fan will enjoy this as Raven is his usual funny and entertaining self. Raven is an open book in teaching you about the wrestling business right here in the must see second volume of Secrets of The Ring.
title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 2
